resources.string: select count(*) as countremb ,(select count(*) from bphzhistory where isrember = \'%1$d\' and dictindex <= \'%4$d\' and dictindex >= \'%3$d\') as countunremb from bphzhistory where dictindex <= \'%4$d\' and dictindex >= \'%3$d\' and isrember = \'%2$d\'
delete from bphzhistory where dictindex <= \'%2$d\' and dictindex >= \'%1$d\'
select * from zidian where zitou= \'%1$s\' or refid=\'%2$s\'
select dictindex from bphzhistory where dictindex <=\'%2$s\' and dictindex >=\'%1$s\' and isrember= \'%3$s\' order by dictindex asc
select dictindex from bpcyhistory where dictindex <=\'%2$s\' and dictindex >=\'%1$s\' and isrember= \'%3$s\' order by dictindex asc

select count(*) as countremb ,(select count(*) from bpcyhistory where isrember = \'%1$d\' and dictindex <= \'%4$d\' and dictindex >= \'%3$d\') as countunremb from bpcyhistory where dictindex <= \'%4$d\' and dictindex >= \'%3$d\' and isrember = \'%2$d\'
delete from bpcyhistory where dictindex <= \'%2$d\' and dictindex >= \'%1$d\'
update chengyu set CYCimu =\'%1$s\' , CYFayin = \'%2$s\' , CYChuchu =\'%3$s\' , CYJinyi= \'%4$s\' ,CYFanyi= \'%5$s\' where cybh = \'%6$s\'
select * from chengyu order by cybh limit \'%1$s\',\'%2$s\'
